name: Alcremie
flavorText:
When it trusts a Trainer, it will treat them to
berries it’s decorated with cream.

pokemon.name: Milcery
pokemon.flavorText:
This Pokémon was born from sweet-smelling
particles in the air. Its body is made of cream.
